entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 16 February 2023
